channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: CEO of Telecoms Giant Swisscom’s Blockchain Unit Steps Down
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Miranda Karanfili
item.description: The CEO of the blockchain unit of Swiss state-owned telecoms company Swisscom has abruptly stepped down from his position

item.title: CBOE Re-Applies With US SEC to List Bitcoin Exchange-Traded Fund
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Aaron Wood
item.description: The Chicago Board Options Exchange’s has re-submitted an application with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission for a rule change to list a Bitcoin ETF

item.title: New York Financial Regulators Grant BitLicense to Bitcoin ATM Operator
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Aaron Wood
item.description: Bitcoin ATM operator Cottonwood Vending LLC has been granted a virtual currency license by the New York State Department of Financial Services

item.title: Seoul City Gov’t Launches ‘Blockchain Governance Team’ for State Services
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: The government of Seoul has launched its own blockchain governance team to explore applications in administrative services

item.title: Florida Appeals Court Reinstates Felony Charges for Unregistered Bitcoin Sale
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Adrian Zmudzinski
item.description: An appellate court in the U.S. state of Florida has reinstated felony charges against a man who allegedly sold Bitcoin to an undercover detective

item.title: Germany's 2nd Largest Stock Exchange Boerse Stuttgart Launches Crypto Trading App
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Berman
item.description: Boerse Stuttgart Group, Germany’s second largest stock exchange, launches app for trading major cryptocurrencies to euro

item.title: Blockchain Capital Leads Funding Round for Crypto Compliance Startup TRM
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Berman
item.description: U.S.-based venture firm Blockchain Capital leads a $1.7 million funding round for TRM — a compliance startup for crypto businesses

item.title: Bitcoin Hovers Under $3,450 as All Top Cryptos See Moderate Losses
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Adrian Zmudzinski
item.description: Bitcoin stays under $3,450 as the top 20 cryptocurrencies report moderate-heavy losses on the day

item.title: Pantera Capital, Coinbase Back Crypto Startup Staked in $4.5 Million Round
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Adrian Zmudzinski
item.description: Major crypto investment firms, including Pantera Capital and Coinbase Ventures, back crypto staking startup Staked

item.title: Global Pharma Giant Merck Wins US Blockchain, AI Patent for Product Authenticity
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Major pharma firm Merck has won a USPTO blockchain and AI patent focusing on supply chain security

item.title: Under Fire: Kik Is Gearing Up for a Fight With the SEC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Kik opposes potential regulatory action from SEC, saying its 2017 Kin token sale followed all the right rules

item.title: Age of Scale: How Can Blockchain Systems Become Powerful Enough for a Global Audience?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Guest Author
item.description: Blockchain technology is facing a serious scalability issue, and sorting it out might not be as easy as some think. What are some of the proposed approaches to solving the problem?

item.title: Coincheck Q3 Finance Report Shows Twofold Improvement Since Trading Resumed
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marie Huillet
item.description: Coincheck halved its losses in Q3 of fiscal year 2019, as compared with the preceding quarter: Monex report

item.title: Nasdaq Reveals 7 Crypto Exchanges Are Using Its Market Monitoring Tech
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marie Huillet
item.description: Nasdaq has revealed that seven crypto exchanges are already using its market monitoring technology, though only two are doing so publicly

item.title: Top Exchange Binance Adds Support for Credit Card Purchases of Major Cryptos
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Adrian Zmudzinski
item.description: Top crypto exchange Binance adds support for credit card crypto purchases via Simplex partnership

item.title: Bitfury to Launch Bitcoin Mining Centers in Paraguay With New Partnership
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Berman
item.description: Bitfury and South Korean p2p research company are planning to launch several mining centers and a cryptocurrency exchange in Paraguay

item.title: NEM Reorganizes Non-Profit Foundation Amid Token Price and Funding Woes
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: XEM token suffers as NEM Foundation announces funding problems

item.title: South Korea Will Keep ICO Ban, Says Financial Services Commission
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Domestic ICO ban in South Korea set to stay, regulator confirms

item.title: Report: Majority of $11.4 Million Stolen in 2018 Iota Token Heist Has Been Found
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marie Huillet
item.description: A top member of the Germany-based Iota Foundation has said the majority of the ~$11 million allegedly stolen in a major Iota token heist last year has been found

item.title: Ethereum Hackathon ETHDenver Partners With UNICEF on Blockchain Bounty System
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marie Huillet
item.description: Ethereum hardware hackathon ETHDenver partners with UNICEF on a bounty token

item.title: Danish Government’s Energinet Signals Iota Deal to Improve Energy Sector Offerings
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Additional partnership confirmed between Iota and Denmark’s state-owned energy company, Energinet

item.title: Ripple Hires Ex-HSBC, CIT Exec as General Counsel After Five-Month Hiatus
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Ripple has made a high-profile legal hire in the form of ex-HSBC general counsel Stuart Alderoty

item.title: Ethereum-Based ‘Wrapped’ Token Backed by Bitcoin Launches
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Aaron Wood
item.description: Wrapped Bitcoin, an Ethereum-based token backed by Bitcoin, has launched today

item.title: Italian Postal Service Joins Hyperledger Blockchain Community
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Aaron Wood
item.description: Poste Italiane, the Italian postal service provider, has joined the Hyperledger blockchain community, which also includes U.S. courier service FedEx

item.title: ConsenSys Developer Joins Ethereum Classic Cooperative as Executive Director
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Aaron Wood
item.description: A developer at blockchain tech firm ConsenSys, Bob Summerwill, has joined the Ethereum Classic Cooperative as its executive director

item.title: Report: Nearly 80 Percent of Crypto Event Attendees Are Male
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Aaron Wood
item.description: Recent data from events-oriented software firm Bizzabo found that 80 percent of crypto event attendees are male

item.title: South Korean Fintech Firm Launches ‘First’ Won-Backed Stablecoin
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Miranda Karanfili
item.description: South Korean fintech firm BxB has launched a 1:1 won-backed stablecoin

item.title: Report: Alipay and WeChat Pay Require Huobi to Remove Payment Methods from OTC Desk
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Chinese payment giants Alipay and WeChat Pay have reportedly requested Huobi to remove their services from its OTC trading desk

item.title: Untraceable Payments and Unlinkable Transactions: Startup Offers “New Generation” Coin
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Maria Yavuz
item.description: A company has created an “untraceable anonymous coin.” The team says the p2p network makes all the users' transactions unlinkable to a particular user or real-world identity #SPONSORED

item.title: Bitcoin, Ripple, Ethereum, EOS, Bitcoin Cash, Litecoin, Tron, Stellar, Bitcoin SV, Cardano: Price Analysis, Jan. 30
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: The entry of major players such as investment firm Fidelity and the governments of UAE and Saudi Arabia instills confidence in the crypto market. How did the charts react?
